title: Kai Ching Suen
description: College Student & Full Stack Web Developer
description_detail: I use Python, Java, React.js & Node.js
about_description: Hello! I am Kai. Nice to meet you. I am an International student from Hong Kong currently studying at New York. I've worked in serval companies as a intern software engineer, intern devloper and industrial trainee, including in game, software and full stack devlopments. Now I am working remotely from Hong Kong as a part time software engineer. I love to design and code, and I enjoy what I do!
name: Kai Ching Suen

content.degree: Bachelor in College of Engineering and Applied Sciences
Associate Science degree in Computer Science (Engineering Sequence)
content.description: Member of Phi Theta Kappa (2016 - 2017) Member of Residence Hall Association (2015 – 2016 ) Member of Resident Selection and Training Committee (2016)

content.position: Part Time Software Engineer & Software Engineer Intern

work_content.company: Towngas - The Hong Kong and China Gas Company
Tompkins Cortland Community College - Residence Life
Tompkins Cortland Community College - Academic Success
Tompkins Cortland Community College - Global Connection

skill_description: Thanks to the knowledge I gained in and outside of classrooms, and the skills I learnt from my intern experiences, I exposed to variety of different technologies.

work_details_content.description: Invest Bot Limited is a startup company that focuses in empowering fund managers and professional investors to make smarter quantifiable and faster investment and portfolio management decisions. I worked at invbots as an intern software engineer during vacations but I also worked as a part time software engineer during the school year. I have been working there since June 2018, and have been highly involved various developments including data preprocessing tools, frontend and backend web, and databases.

work_details_content.company: The Hong Kong and China Gas Comapny Ltd.
work_details_content.description: The Hong Kong and China Gas Company Limited was Hong Kong’s first public utility. They are currently one of the largest energy suppliers in Hong Kong, operating with world-class corporate management and leading-edge business practices. I worked at Towngas as an Industrial trainee at IT department. During my internship period, I was assigned to two projects. Though, I completed three by the end of duty with a simple Internal Chatbot using web crawling and natural learning processing, Amazon Alexa developments using python, nodejs and raspberry pi, and lastly an android application that uses for people counting with a Bluetooth device, Estimote Beacon.

Twitchy Finger Limited is a mobile games developer and publisher for Google Play and iOS App Store. I was a game developer intern during their development period of "Be A Man: Do The Right Thing". It's a mobile game, built with Unity and game maker, consisted 30 more different mini games. During my internship period, I assisted and completed nearly 1/3 of the game content.

Tompkins Cortland Community College is one of 30 community colleges in the State University of New York, and offers degrees and certificates in more than 40 academic programs. During my school years in Tompkins Cortland, I worked in serval departments, including Residence Life, Academic Success and Global Connections, as a resident assistant, tutor and office assistant. The positions varied, though, skills that were high demanded, shared similarities, like Leadership, Communication and Creativity.

contactus.description: If you wanna get in touch, learn more about my experiences and my work, please fill up the form below and I will get back to you within a few days! Thanks for taking the time to reach out!
